name: apollo-link
description: Flexible, lightweight transport layer for GraphQL

0.0.0.name: apollo-link
0.0.0.description: Flexible, lightweight transport layer for GraphQL

scripts.lint: tslint --type-check -p tsconfig.json src/*.ts && tslint --type-check -p tsconfig.json tests/*.ts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

0.6.1-beta.1.name: apollo-link

0.6.1-beta.4.name: apollo-link
0.6.1-beta.4.description: Flexible, lightweight transport layer for GraphQL

scripts.build:browser: browserify ./lib/bundle.umd.js -o=./lib/bundle.js --i apollo-utilities --i zen-observable-ts && npm run minify:browser
scripts.filesize: npm run build && npm run build:browser
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
